title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 374.1 - Withholding of State tax overpayments
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 374.1 - Withholding of State tax overpayments

State Regulations

The department is entitled to receive overpayments of

State tax owed to any individual who has received an overpayment of public
assistance benefits provided that the department or a social services district
has previously mailed a written determination or notice to the individual, identifying the amount and nature of the public assistance benefits
overpayment, and requested repayment of the overpayment. The department may not
receive an overpayment of State tax if a proceeding for administrative or
judicial review regarding the overpayment of public assistance benefits is
pending or if the time for initiation of such proceeding has not
expired. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
374.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
